name: Exozet
description:
We love and design the digital world. In direct interaction from creation and technology. Our digital DNA unfolds in well-founded strategies, creative designs and a technological pioneer. Since 1996. We are the agency for digital transformation. Thanks to our 140 employees in Berlin, Potsdam-Babelsberg and Vienna. And thanks to our customers.
We work for established media companies like Axel Springer, the ORF and the BBC, established brands and companies such as Audi, Swisscom, Deutsche Telekom and young champions such as MagineTV, Kitchen Stories and Wooga.
Our range of strategy consulting, implementation and marketing is the foundation for the development of products, services and solutions with outstanding user experience. We work directly on the economic success of our customers.
